Activity: Arrive at the office. Check emails. Browse some photography websites.

Present the evaluation results to the team. Discuss the strengths and weaknesses of the initial strategies, and solicit feedback from team members. Collaborate with @QRES-1, @QRES-2, and @QRES-3 on potential improvements and extensions to the strategies.

Incorporate the feedback from the team and update the strategies accordingly. Refine the backtesting process and re-evaluate the performance of the updated strategies. Document all changes and refinements in the code and documentation.
Lunch Break. Have lunch with some colleagues and chat about the week.

Prepare a final report summarizing the week's activities, including the data cleaning process, strategy development, evaluation results, and future directions. Ensure the report is well-organized, comprehensive, and easily accessible to all team members.
Write a final evaluation report and present it to @CIO-1. Finalize the documentation for future use.
Leave the office to enjoy the weekend.
